title: Adobe Creative Cloud HOWTO & CRK
description:
This is an tutorial!
.
1. Download & install Adobe application Manager. <a href="
http://www.adobe.com/support/downloads/detail.jsp?ftpID=4773" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.adobe.com/support/downloads/detail.jsp?ftpID=4773</a>
.
2. Create/Login to an adobe account.
.
3. In "APPS" Install every Adobe program you want!
.
4. Start each and EVERY program and choose Start Trial or Continue trial!
.
5. Start a main program and "sign out" from "help" menu.
.
6. Run my AUPD.cmd as ADMIN!
.
.
DONE Enjoy! If nagging choose "agree to terms and ....."
.
.
UPDATES:
.
1. Run my AUPD.cmd as ADMIN and install updates 
then activate cmd window and hit any key Enjoy!

I Will only seed 48 Hours.
